about_me: Passionate about cinema history, especially war dramas, European arthouse, and 90s thrillers. Favorite directors: Christopher Nolan, Denis Villeneuve, Wong Kar-Wai. I curate movie lists based on emotion, storytelling, and visual impact.

favorites.title: Saving Private Ryan
favorites.reason: Unmatched realism and emotional intensity in war depiction.

favorites.title: Blade Runner 2049
favorites.reason: Visually stunning and deeply existential sci-fi masterpiece.

favorites.title: Parasite
favorites.reason: Brilliantly layered social commentary wrapped in suspense.

favorites.title: Oppenheimer
favorites.reason: Powerful narrative about genius, guilt, and consequences.

favorites.title: Interstellar
favorites.reason: Epic space odyssey balancing science, emotion, and human hope.

favorites.title: Joker
favorites.reason: Raw psychological descent and stunning performance by Joaquin Phoenix.

reviews.review_text: A brutal, honest, and emotionally devastating portrayal of war. Spielberg at his most human.
Technically brilliant but emotionally distant. Still, Nolanâ€™s audacity deserves praise.
